attributes.action: Scrap the Ridiculously high M6 TOLL charges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How can the government preach they are trying to solve congestion problems when the cost of a 20 mile stretch of motorway is now going to be £4.50 and £9 for a van driver like me!!! WHAT A RIP OFF are they just going to keep raising everything every year?? If the cost was just £1 for a motorbike, £2 for a car and £3 for a van then M6 congestion through junctions 10A - 8 will ease considerably, does that not make sense? no only money talks apperently. what a rip off, and my van a 2007 maxus pollutes far less than most modern petrol cars and equlivent so why should i have to pay £18 to use a toll road lol NOT A CHANCE

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
